title: How to Play Fortuna

steps.headline: Search online to find an online Fortuna game.
steps.description: Fortuna is a fun game you can play from a computer or smartphone device. Go to an Internet browser, and search for something like “Fortuna casino game.” Browse the list of options available to decide what server you’d like to play on. For instance, you can play Fortuna at sites including https://casino.efortuna.ro/en/.

steps.headline: Pick the website to use based on personal preference and user reviews.
steps.description: There are a ton of sites that offer Fortuna games both for free and for a small fee. To help you narrow down options, read the reviews and ratings of the sites and use your best judgment. For instance, if many users complain about losing money, you may want to use another site. If several users claim to have won big, this may be a game worth trying.

steps.headline: Make an account when you are ready to play.
steps.description:
You must be 18 years or older to make an account. Once you pick a website to use, look for the “Sign up” link, usually in green or yellow. Click this, and fill in your email, currency preference, username, and password. Accept the terms and conditions, and click “Sign up.”
You’ll likely get an email verification which must be completed before you can set up your payment method. To do this, click the link in the email to verify your account.

steps.headline: Choose the particular Fortuna game you want to play.
steps.description: After you sign into your account, it’s time to pick a game! Browse the Fortuna casino-style game options on the site you signed up for. Click on “Games” and scroll through the options to make your selection. When you are ready to play, click on the game to select it. There are usually dozens of options, ranging in themes such as Jack and the Beanstalk, King Kong, and pirate’s treasure.

steps.headline: Play Fortuna slot machine games at a local casino.
steps.description:
In addition to online games, you can also play Fortuna in the slot machine section of a casino. With this option, you do not need to make an account. Instead of connecting a credit card, use coins or cash. Simply insert your payment, select your bet, and press “Spin.”
You must be 21 or older to enter most casinos.

steps.headline: Start with demo versions to get your feet wet.
steps.description: If you want to play Fortuna without spending money, consider searching for demo games when browsing website options. Demo games give you introductory levels so you can see how the games work overall. However, you can only play so many levels in the demo versions. This way, you can have fun playing the game without worrying about winning or losing money.

steps.headline: Use the free spins offered when you make an account to try your luck.
steps.description: Most games give you 30-50 spins for free when you make an account. This way, you can play a few games for free before you load money onto your account. These spins are automatically loaded into your account after you register, so you don’t have to worry about promotional codes or referral links.

steps.headline: Find promo codes to earn more free spins.
steps.description:
Another way to play for free is to search for promotional codes for free spins online. Look up “Play Fortuna promo codes” or something similar, and browse the links for a site with a promo code. To apply your code, go into your account and select the payment information. Then, look for the “Apply promo code” link. Paste the code into the box and press “Select.”
When you go to play the next game, the free spins will be loaded into your account.

steps.headline: Set up a payment method if you want to win money.
steps.description: To play Fortuna games other than the demo version, you must deposit money into your account. To do this, click on “My Account” or something similar, and select “Account Settings.” Then, look for the “Payment Information” section, and include your credit card number, expiration date, and 3-digit security code. You can also deposit an amount of money into your account, such as $10-50 (£7.72-38.62). You can also link your account to automatically withdrawal money when you need it. If you do this, be careful not to spend too much. It’s important to keep track of your spending so you don’t wind up gambling too much.

steps.headline: Select the number of points or dollars you want to bet each spin.
steps.description: Some games have fixed bet amounts, while others give you the option to adjust how much you can bet for each spin. If you can change the bet amount, look for the “Bet” button, and click on it. Then, insert your new bet amount. If you bet higher, you have a greater chance of winning. Some games require you to have a bet multiplier of 5 or 10. This means that your bet must be in multiples of 5 or 10, rather than single digits. If you have a bet multiplier of 10, you can bet 10, 20, 30, 40, and so on.

steps.headline: Press the “Spin” button to start the game.
steps.description: The “Spin” button is usually located in the bottom right corner or in the middle of the screen. When you click “Spin” the game pieces will automatically rotate, and they will land on a new piece after the spin stops. The button may say “Spin,” or it may resemble an arrow in a circular shape.

steps.headline: Win points when you match of 3 or more of the same icon.
steps.description: The gameplay of Fortuna is quite simple, though your winning potential and particular match sequence depend on the particular game you play. After you press “Spin,” the icons automatically adjust into their new positions. If there are 3 or more of the same icon in a row, you win points. Different icons have different point values, and you can match up to 5-6 icons in a row to win big. Fortuna is a game of chance. There is no strategy involved. Some games have different sequences that also earn you points, including 3 of a kind or multiple “Wild” icons. This depends on the particular game you are playing. You can read about the game’s point values under the description of the particular game. This is usually located at the bottom of the “Demo” version.

steps.headline: Cash out when you win prize money.
steps.description: After you play for a while, you may win lots of money! The amount depends on your bet, currency settings, and particular earnings. To redeem your balance, go into your profile settings, and click “Payment information.” You’ll likely see a “Redeem” or “Cash Out” button. Click that and follow the particular instructions for cashing out your earnings, based on your individual game. For example, some online games award the money back onto your credit card. If you are playing Fortuna in a casino, you can print out a voucher for your earnings and redeem it at the casino for cash or more playing vouchers.
